sql_result.sql: WITH base AS (SELECT student.id FROM student JOIN class ON student.class_id = class.id WHERE class.grade_year = 2022 AND class.class_name = '2022级计算机科学与技术1班' AND student.gender = '男' AND student.is_deleted = 0 AND class.is_deleted = 0) SELECT COUNT(*) AS student_count FROM base

entity_mappings.reason: 根据字段描述“年级/入学年份（如 2022 级）”及 probe_samples 中 class.grade_year 候选值 ['2022', '2024', '2023', '2025']，'22级' 映射为数值 2022
probe_samples 中 class.class_name 候选值包含 '2022级计算机科学与技术1班'，其为唯一匹配 '计科一班' 的规范化全称（'计科'是'计算机科学与技术'的通用简称，'一班'对应'1班'），故归一化为 '2022级计算机科学与技术1班'
probe_samples 中 student.gender 候选值为 ['男', '女']，'男生' 规范化为 '男'

output.executed_sql: WITH base AS (SELECT student.id FROM student JOIN class ON student.class_id = class.id WHERE class.grade_year = 2022 AND class.class_name = '2022级计算机科学与技术1班' AND student.gender = '男' AND student.is_deleted = 0 AND class.is_deleted = 0) SELECT COUNT(*) AS student_count FROM base
